GIGABYTE AORUS 4K Gaming Monitor Ready for Next Generation Game Console

APRIL 28 2021 | VIETNAM

  • News

Worldwide sales of new generation game consoles are still booming with no signs of slowing down. However, to date, pairing these products with compatible high-resolution displays to push the limits of refresh rates to 120Hz and beyond has remained an unpredictable task.... GIGABYTE's newly launched AORUS 4K gaming monitor has brought a new ray of hope to long-awaited gamers. Full HDMI 2.1 compatibility comes with the new AORUS display allowing gamers to unlock higher frame rates and resolutions on next-generation game consoles, like PlayStation 5 and XBOX Series X.z

The GIGABYTE AORUS 4K tactical gaming monitor is the ultimate 2-way monitor. This series of monitors not only delivers eSports-class display performance with a refresh rate of up to 144Hz and a 0.5ms response time, but also takes full advantage of the bandwidth of the HDMI 2.1 connector that users can enjoy. fully exploit new generation handheld gaming devices. This makes the GIGABYTE AORUS 4K the ideal monitor for multi-platform gaming.

Thanks to the HDMI 2.1 connection, gamers can fully enjoy the extreme gaming performance supported by high-end graphics cards, such as the RTX 30 series, when playing games on PC. When paired with next-generation handheld gaming devices, gamers can play their favorite AAA titles at 120Hz for the first time for ultra-smooth gameplay in stunning 4K resolution. In addition to the superiority in display performance, GIGABYTE has also succeeded in optimizing the gaming experience with AORUS's exclusive tactical features. Gaming enhancements this time around, including Aim Stabilizer Dynamic), Black Equalizer and Active Noise Cancellation, previously only available to PC gamers, are now available for next-generation handheld gaming.

Màn hình chơi game chiến thuật GIGABYTE AORUS 4K đã có hàng với nhiều kích thước khác nhau từ 32 inch, 43 inch đến 48 inch cho game thủ lựa chọn. Để biết thêm chi tiết về dòng màn hình AORUS 4K và bộ tính năng chơi game mạnh mẽ vui lòng truy cập: https://www.aorus.com/monitors/4k
